short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use Auto follow/unfollow/like to increasing your followers and popularity. The Instagram automation bot.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use Growth Bot Instagram automation tool, you can quickly get genuine and organic followers.
Growth Bot can follow specific Instagram accounts followers, following, commenters and even likers. The Growth solution will help you grow your account organically while you do your everyday activities.

We have the following options for your account follow action:

✓ Follow @Account followers
✓ Follow @Account followings
✓ Follow @Account commenters
✓ Follow @Account Likers

ADVANCED FILTERING OPTIONS:

✓ Min/Max Followers
✓ Min/Max Following
✓ Min/Max Follow Ratio
✓ Min/Max Posts
✓ Private Accounts
✓ Public Accounts
✓ Verified Accounts
✓ Non-Verified Accounts
✓ Business Accounts
✓ Non-Business Accounts
✓ Recently Joined Accounts

GROWTH BOT FEATURES:

Auto Follow
Follow accounts based on your own target audience.

Auto Post Like
Like specific trending posts based on your own filters.

Auto Unfollow
Unfollow users followed by Auto Follow.

Auto Comment
Comment on specific posts based on your filters.

Data privacy
All data is processed in your local computer, never passing through our web server, and no one knows what you doing.

SUPPORT

If you have any questions, please keep in touch via help@extensionsfox.com.
